InHideout.synopsis: You encounter the kid you saved from the harpies in the children's hideout. He wants to thank you, but is still a little shy.

AD_PlayerCharmed.synopsis: AD when the player is charmed by the harpies.

AD_PlayerUncharmed.synopsis: AD played when player wakes up from being charmed by the harpies.

AD_GnomeUncharmed.synopsis: The tiefling kid wakes up fron his trance, he's panicked and (almost) crying because he's so frightened.

AfterHarpyEncounter.synopsis: Non-critical path. The player has just saved the child from harpies that had enchanted and tried to eat him. He's shy and still scared.
AfterHarpyEncounter.how_to_trigger: - loadlevel WLD_Main_A - goto 325, 549- Speak to Mirkon and end the dialogue- Kill all harpy units with ctrl + shift + k (killcombat kills Mirkon)- Dialogue triggers automatically; if not, talk to Mirkon

AD_PlayerWarnings.synopsis: AD played when the player gets close to the harpy situation, warning them that something is amiss.

CharmedVictim_Wildshape.synopsis: Non-critical path. Unless the player has snapped him out of it, the boy will be enchanted and wanting to get closer to the source of the song.

AD_HarpyAttackedEarly.synopsis: AD when player attacks the Harpy leader before the proper combat starts

VB_PlayerWarnings.synopsis: AD played when the player gets close to the harpy situation, warning them that something is amiss.

CharmedVictim.synopsis: Non-critical path. Unless the player has snapped him out of it, the boy will be enchanted and wanting to get closer to the source of the song.
CharmedVictim.how_to_trigger: occurs during regular den statein reCon: teleport S_DEN_CharmedKidwalk towards water - dialogue triggers

AD_HarpyInterrupted.synopsis: AD that fires when the player wakes up the halfling (the harpy's prey) from his enchantment.

AD_GnomeCharmed.synopsis: The tiefling kid has been charmed, and is being controlled by a beautiful song that beckons him forth, promising everything will be all right if he follows.

VB_FoundHarpyNest.synopsis: VB when the player finds the Harpy's nest

InHideout_2.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Character wasn't on the beach during the harpy attack.

InHideout_6.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_6.text: I wish the harpies would've killed you!
InHideout_6.context: NodeContext: The player has done something very bad to the kids.

InHideout_9.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_9.text: You came! I have - here! Mol said I should thank you properly. For the harpies.
InHideout_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: The kid takes something out of his back pocket. If you can suggest that he's holding a pageoff-camera, that would be very good.

InHideout_5.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_5.text: So I wrote you a story!
InHideout_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: If you can suggest that he's offering the player a page off-camera, that would be very good.

InHideout_12.speaker: Player
InHideout_12.text: Aren't you the clever one? That's very kind.

InHideout_1.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_1.text: It's about you! I hope you like it.
InHideout_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: De child hands the player the drawing.NodeContext: The child is very proud and happy because you accepted his story

InHideout_4.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_4.text: Ah - ummm, it's gone. I had it just now, I'm - I'm sorry.

InHideout_11.speaker: Player
InHideout_11.text: I've heard enough of your chatter. I don't need more.

InHideout_0.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_0.text: Oh. Umm... okay, I'll... keep it.
InHideout_0.context: NodeContext: The player refused his gift, saying it's junk

InHideout_3.speaker: Player
InHideout_3.text: That's not how I usually get paid for killing monsters.

InHideout_8.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_8.text: I - I don't have any gold. Sorry.
InHideout_8.context: NodeContext: the player sayd they don't want his gift, but want gold instead. He's very very disappointed that his gift got rejected..

InHideout_10.speaker: Mirkon
InHideout_10.text: I'm gonna be like you some day. Killing all the scary monsters!

AD_PlayerCharmed_1.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerCharmed_1.text: Such rapturous music. I can hardly resist...

AD_PlayerCharmed_2.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerCharmed_2.context: NodeContext: Enchanted - on Karlach node, 'Malcanthet' is pronounced 'MAL-can-fet'

AD_PlayerCharmed_4.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerCharmed_4.text: I could listen to this forever...

AD_PlayerCharmed_6.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerCharmed_6.text: I could drown in that song...

AD_PlayerCharmed_9.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerCharmed_9.text: I'll be there soon, my lady.

AD_PlayerCharmed_11.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerCharmed_11.text: Closer... I need to get closer!

AD_PlayerCharmed_15.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerCharmed_15.text: I've never heard something so beautiful...

AD_PlayerUncharmed_4.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerUncharmed_4.text: Wh- what now? Damned monster. I'll make you pay!

AD_GnomeUncharmed_2.speaker: Mirkon
AD_GnomeUncharmed_2.context: NodeContext: The character wakes up from a trance, startled - not crying yet

AfterHarpyEncounter_11.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cowering in fear (he's hunkering down, with his hands over his face/ears). Scripter note: Use the generic cower or some approximation for consistency with scripter animations.

AfterHarpyEncounter_24.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_24.text: They're gone. Are you all right?

AfterHarpyEncounter_12.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_12.text: Soothe the child with a calming tune.

AfterHarpyEncounter_0.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: He stops cowering and looks up at you - he opens up a bit, but doesn't stand up yet.

AfterHarpyEncounter_22.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_22.text: I'm [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53], slayer of monsters, teller of tales, saviour of you. The pleasure's mine.

AfterHarpyEncounter_9.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_9.text: Wauw... I'm Mirkon, I - oh no.
AfterHarpyEncounter_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: He isn't cowering anymore- he's looking up at you instead.NodeContext: The player just introduced himself as monster slayer and bard extraordinaire - he's a bit in awe.

AfterHarpyEncounter_7.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_7.text: I-I had to get the gold from the nest. Mol will be so mad. I got to go.
AfterHarpyEncounter_7.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The boy gets up from cowering starts to run after saying this, then stops and turns back. 

NOTE (Amelie): He's will be starting the line from a standing position.

AfterHarpyEncounter_13.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_13.text: Never mind that - are you all right?

AfterHarpyEncounter_6.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_6.text: No - yes - I mean... I don't know!

AfterHarpyEncounter_20.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_20.text: Take a breath, deep and slow. You're safe now.

AfterHarpyEncounter_18.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_18.text: Th-that's what the voice said. I almost got to the nest, but the singing...

AfterHarpyEncounter_23.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_23.text: I need to get back. Mol will be so mad.
AfterHarpyEncounter_23.context: CinematicNodeContext: The boy gets up from cowering starts to run after saying this, then stops and turns back.

AfterHarpyEncounter_3.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_3.text: Go back to your parents. There's worse in the wilds than harpies.

AfterHarpyEncounter_14.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_14.text: Th-they're gone. Now there's just Mol.

AfterHarpyEncounter_8.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_8.text: Stop snivelling or they'll be back. They like tasty little tiefling kids.

AfterHarpyEncounter_25.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: the kid scrambles away and starts running.NodeContext: You were mean to the kid, who is now scared of you and running away, screaming

AfterHarpyEncounter_19.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_19.text: Calm there. You're a hero. You survived a harpy's wily lullaby, my friend. Be proud.

AfterHarpyEncounter_2.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_2.text: Really? You think so? I'll tell Mol! Oh no...

AfterHarpyEncounter_1.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_1.text: She'll be so mad. I didn't get the gold from the nest. I got to go.
AfterHarpyEncounter_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The boy gets up from cowering starts to run after saying this, then stops and turns back.

AfterHarpyEncounter_26.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_26.text: Wait, umm... you should meet Mol. She'll be grateful you helped me.

AfterHarpyEncounter_29.speaker: Mirkon
AfterHarpyEncounter_29.text: Find a boy called Doni. Tell him you want to see the 'Dragon's Lair'.
AfterHarpyEncounter_29.context: NodeContext: soft - he's telling you a secret.

AfterHarpyEncounter_15.speaker: Player
AfterHarpyEncounter_15.text: You were brave, child. Heroic, even. You're safe now.

AD_PlayerWarnings_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerWarnings_0.context: NodeContext: wondering, a little bit in awe.

CharmedVictim_Wildshape_2.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_Wildshape_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gnome isn't looking at the player, but in the direction the singing comes from.NodeContext: in awe, entranced. Trying not to disturb the singer.

CharmedVictim_Wildshape_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harpy flies in and perches menacingly on the rock, while she keeps singing

CharmedVictim_Wildshape_1.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_Wildshape_1.text: Yes, everything's gonna be fine... once I get there...

CharmedVictim_Wildshape_3.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_Wildshape_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Not really turning towards the player while he's talking to the player. He keeps looking for the voice while he talks.NodeContext: Low voice, is trying not to disturb the singer, but is a little irritated with the player.

AD_HarpyAttackedEarly_0.speaker: Harpy
AD_HarpyAttackedEarly_0.context: NodeContext: Feral bird-woman - a scream of rage and hunger

VB_PlayerWarnings_1.speaker: Player
VB_PlayerWarnings_1.context: NodeContext: wondering, a little bit in awe.

CharmedVictim_24.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gnome isn't looking at the player, but in the direction the singing comes from.NodeContext: in awe, entranced. Trying not to disturb the singer.

CharmedVictim_78.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_78.text: *Your favourite drownings all take place in shallow water... Just a slice of the ankle tendons...*

CharmedVictim_82.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_82.text: You shouldn't be standing out in the water. It's dangerous.

CharmedVictim_88.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_88.text: Don't you hear it? It's so peaceful.

CharmedVictim_54.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_54.text: I don't hear anything. Come back to shore.

CharmedVictim_68.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_68.text: Focus and try to hear what he hears.

CharmedVictim_83.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_83.text: *A sweet melody beckons you. It vibrates with magic - a harpy's charm.*

CharmedVictim_41.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_41.text: Focus your will. Improvise a magical shell to dampen the music.

CharmedVictim_9.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_9.text: *A sweet melody plays above the waves, beckoning you - drowning out all logical thought.*
CharmedVictim_9.context: InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

CharmedVictim_85.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_85.text: Close your eyes and listen to the song.

CharmedVictim_28.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_28.text: *The suffocating yearning suddenly fades as the spell breaks. You are free.*
CharmedVictim_28.context: InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

CharmedVictim_3.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_3.text: No, no. It's just a bit of water. I only want to listen. Just a little closer...
CharmedVictim_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The halfling berely glances at you even when he gets mad.NodeContext: He's not concerned even tough you told him he'd drown.

CharmedVictim_27.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_27.text: '... Her man would not listen, he thought it tall tales, until he rubbed up against all of her scales!'

CharmedVictim_60.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_60.text: Auch! My ears! Wait - why am I wet?
CharmedVictim_60.context: NodeContext: He's just been shaken from his stupor because someone else shouted over the harpy.

CharmedVictim_42.speaker: Harpy
CharmedVictim_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harpy flies in and perches menacingly on the rock above the players. Should look grandiose and cool.NodeContext: Feral bird-woman - rage and hunger, you just took away her prey.

CharmedVictim_36.speaker: Harpy
CharmedVictim_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other harpies descend on the rocks around us.NodeContext: Angry, and viscious. You  you just took away her prey.

CharmedVictim_94.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_94.text: Shhh! You're ruining it. I just want to - just a little closer...
CharmedVictim_94.context: CinematicNodeContext: The child berely glances at you even when he gets mad.InternalNodeContext: SFX: we could hear a bit of another song, but the harpy song is stronger.NodeContext: He's annoyed that you are trying to interrupt the song, then adresses the harpy again.

CharmedVictim_96.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_96.text: Sing: 'There once was a lady who met with a merrow, and tried to disclose it to her foolish fellow...'

CharmedVictim_57.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_57.text: Drown out the harpies with a ROAR.

CharmedVictim_2.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_2.text: *Your chest fills with yearning. You want to get closer - you need to get closer.*
CharmedVictim_2.context: InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

CharmedVictim_21.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_21.text: *Just a few more steps... and you can lose yourself in that sweet song...*
CharmedVictim_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other harpies descend on the rocks around the water.InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

CharmedVictim_6.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_6.text: Focus by singing: 'There once was a lady who met with a merrow, and tried to disclose it to her foolish fellow...'

CharmedVictim_30.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_30.text: Pick his pockets while he's distracted.

CharmedVictim_91.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_91.text: *You lift the child's gold pouch as he stumbles deeper into the water, oblivious.*

CharmedVictim_38.speaker: Astarion
CharmedVictim_38.text: You villain! I didn't know you had it in you.
CharmedVictim_38.context: NodeContext: Shocked at first, then a little coy/even flirty.

CharmedVictim_89.speaker: Shadowheart
CharmedVictim_89.text: Nicely done. I hope you're intending to share.
CharmedVictim_89.context: NodeContext: A discreet aside, admiring the player's successful pickpocketing of a gnome.

CharmedVictim_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harpy flies in and perches menacingly on the rock, while she keeps singing

CharmedVictim_19.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_19.text: Yes, everything's gonna be fine... once I get there...

CharmedVictim_5.speaker: Narrator
CharmedVictim_5.text: *You slip your hand into his pocket but find nothing.*

CharmedVictim_66.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_66.text: Don't touch me! You won't stop me! Just a little closer...
CharmedVictim_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: the player reaches for the child's pocket, but he jerks away, then shouts this line.NodeContext: angy and still under trance.

CharmedVictim_44.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gnome isn't looking at the player, but in the direction the singing comes from.NodeContext: in awe, entranced. Trying not to disturb the singer.

CharmedVictim_65.speaker: Player
CharmedVictim_65.text: Focus your will. Improvise a magical shell to dampen the music.

CharmedVictim_74.speaker: Mirkon
CharmedVictim_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Not really turning towards the player while he's talking to the player. He keeps looking for the voice while he talks.NodeContext: Low voice, is trying not to disturb the singer, but is a little irritated with the player.

AD_HarpyInterrupted_0.speaker: Harpy
AD_HarpyInterrupted_0.context: NodeContext: Feral bird-woman - rage and hunger

VB_FoundHarpyNest_0.speaker: Player
VB_FoundHarpyNest_0.text: A giant nest... let's see what we can find.
VB_FoundHarpyNest_0.context: NodeContext: They enter the nest and smell the offal the harpies left behind.

VB_FoundHarpyNest_1.speaker: Player
VB_FoundHarpyNest_1.text: Must be what that kid was talking about.
VB_FoundHarpyNest_1.context: NodeContext: They find a nest after a child mentioned there would be a nest around there.

VB_FoundHarpyNest_2.speaker: Player
VB_FoundHarpyNest_2.text: Let's see what those harpies were hoarding.
VB_FoundHarpyNest_2.context: NodeContext: They enter the nest and smell the offal the harpies left behind.
